title: A Week In The Life, Vol 9.

author: Jessica
excerpt: How the heck is it march already?! Time is flying way too fast. Still very into yogurt bowls. School drop off! My car right now is an utter nightmare. Sooo messy – the salt, snow, winter mess is the worst. This is in my new book! Lots of hockey this week! His goal celebration kills […]
text: How the heck is it march already?! Time is flying way too fast. Still very into yogurt bowls. School drop off! My car right now is an utter nightmare. Sooo messy – the salt, snow, winter mess is the worst. This is in my new book! Lots of hockey this week! His goal celebration kills me. Happiest boy. He played with these for three hours straight! Friday night we went to an event for my brother’s school – he’s a principal. This dessert was unreal. Celebrated our bff’s birthday! This boy loves to bowl. So fun! Also got a haircut this week. I’d love to hear this convo. Irish cream cold brew. Emilia’s hot chocolate. She asked to wear lipgloss today and I couldn’t say no. Lots more hockey this weekend. Also had an end of year family hockey party! Third child. So proud! Annnd that’s another weekend in the books!
html:
How the heck is it march already?!

Time is flying way too fast.

Still very into yogurt bowls.

School drop off!

My car right now is an utter nightmare. Sooo messy – the salt, snow, winter mess is the worst.

This is in my new book!

Lots of hockey this week!

His goal celebration kills me.

Happiest boy. He played with these for three hours straight!

Friday night we went to an event for my brother’s school – he’s a principal.

This dessert was unreal.

Celebrated our bff’s birthday!

This boy loves to bowl.

So fun!

Also got a haircut this week.

I’d love to hear this convo.

Irish cream cold brew.

Emilia’s hot chocolate.

She asked to wear lipgloss today and I couldn’t say no.

Lots more hockey this weekend.

Also had an end of year family hockey party!

Third child.

So proud!

Annnd that’s another weekend in the books!
